title: Open House This Friday 8/5/22 10am-1pm UNIT #8
posting_body: OPEN HOUSE FRIDAY, AUGUST 5th 10AM-1PM -  SAME DAY APPLICATIONS AVAILABLE
Our floorplans have lovely modern updates with touches of classic charm.
We are currently offering our spacious 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment home located on the second floor.
1211 Jefferson Street Apartments is a beautiful apartment community surrounded with a unique blend of shopping, dining, and recreation for your convenience.

This community are only minutes away from the newly remodeled Santa Clara Town Center that features many stores and restaurants including Habit Burger & Grill, organic grocer Sprouts Market and retail giant Target, China Stix Restaurant, Chipotle Mexican Grill, Footwear Etc. and Carter's.
Among the retail stores and the restaurants that will be added are Saaj Mediterranean, Peet's Coffee & Tea, Panera Bread & Bakery, GNC, Sprint and Peninsula Beauty. 1211
Jefferson Street is also located in The Old Quad neighborhood in Santa Clara that is filled with historic buildings, landmarks, and stories about the beginnings of Santa Clara.
Nearby parks include Fremont Park, Civic Center Park and Rotary Park.
Unit Type: 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom
Sq Ft: 700
Available: Now with 12-month lease
Unit Features:

Renovated kitchen and bathroom Beautiful hand-picked contemporary hardware and fixtures Refinished original 1950's hardwood floor in living room and bedroom Newly painted Gas stove and large pantry in the kitchen Plenty of storage space throughout the unit with a large linen closet Eat in kitchen area for your dining table Spacious closet in the bedroom Natural light filled living room due to a corner location Unit with character and charm
Desirable Location:
Walk Score 73 “Very Walkable”
Located in the Old Quad Neighborhood
Prime area of Santa Clara new restaurants, shops and next to the park
Minutes to the Ace Train Altamont Corridor Express – Santa Clara Station
Nearby parks include Fremont Park, Civic Center Park and Larry J. Marsalli Park
Pet Policy:
$30 pet rent (per cat) or $50 pet rent (dog)
Maximum 2 pets allowed (2 indoor cats, 1dog or 1 dog and 1 indoor cat)
Deposit $300 (per cat) or $500 (dog)
Maximum weight: 50 lbs.
Breed Restrictions Apply
